name: Drive-By
description:
Driving Simulator with Bluetooth Multiplayer As this is not a finished game there are many features that still need to come out in order to fully improve the game, however, I am very happy with the way the Minimap is coming along and am excited to release the next update! I am going to perfect the way that the racing gamemode is going to work, before I work on any other gamemodes but you can download the .apk to test out what I have done so far! Latest Features:
  • Race Mode
  • Leaderboards with unique Usernames
  • Quality Settings
  • Optional FPS Counter
  • Checkpoints
  • Minimap Locator
  • Basic AI racing
  • New Map-- Trout
More Info about Release to be Determined.

Updates on my Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/AntaveGames
